Code

Class Villain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Code.Villain

  • public class Villain
extends java.lang.Object
    The villain object for the game. Each map has a unique villain. Is fought in the battle part of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Villain(int type)
      Creates the villain, gives it the appropriate attributes for its type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeHealth(int healthChange)
      Changes the health value of the villain, if health drops below 0, marks villain as dead by setting alive to false.
      java.lang.String chooseGame()
      Selects a game.
      boolean getAlive()
      Determines if a villain is alive.
      java.lang.String getFavoriteGame()
      Gets the favorite game of this Villain
      int getHealth()
      Gets the villains health.
      java.lang.String getMainTaunt()
      Gets the taunt of the Villain
      int getMaxHealth()
      Gets the villains max health
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the Villain
      int getStrengthModifier()
      Gets the strength modifier of this Villain
      boolean isSuperVillain()
      Determines if the villain is a SuperVillain

    • Constructor Detail

      • Villain

        public Villain(int type)
        Creates the villain, gives it the appropriate attributes for its type.
        Parameters:
        type - An Integer representing which type of villain to create

    • Method Detail

      • getAlive

        public boolean getAlive()
        Determines if a villain is alive.
        Returns:
        true is Villain is alive, otherwise false

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the Villain
        Returns:
        The villain's name.

      • getMainTaunt

        public java.lang.String getMainTaunt()
        Gets the taunt of the Villain
        Returns:
        The villain's taunt.

      • getStrengthModifier

        public int getStrengthModifier()
        Gets the strength modifier of this Villain
        Returns:
        a modifier which increases the amount the villain hurts the hero. (0 for no increase).

      • getFavoriteGame

        public java.lang.String getFavoriteGame()
        Gets the favorite game of this Villain
        Returns:
        a string noting the villains favorite game.

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Gets the villains max health
        Returns:
        The maximum health of the villain.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Gets the villains health.
        Returns:
        The amount of health the villain has.

      • changeHealth

        public void changeHealth(int healthChange)
        Changes the health value of the villain, if health drops below 0, marks villain as dead by setting alive to false. Positive values increase health, negative numbers decrease health.
        Parameters:
        healthChange - The amount to change the health by

      • isSuperVillain

        public boolean isSuperVillain()
        Determines if the villain is a SuperVillain
        Returns:
        A boolean value which is true only if the villain is a supervillain

      • chooseGame

        public java.lang.String chooseGame()
        Selects a game. If the hero has a favorite game it will always be that game.
        Returns:
        A string naming a game.
